import React,{useState} from 'react'; import * as mdb from 'mdb-ui-kit'; import './signin.css'; function Sign(){ const [Login, setLogin] = useState ({ name: " ", surname: " " }) const setting = (e) =>{ setLogin( { ...Login, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) } function signin(e){ e.preventDefault(); const [name, surname] = Login console.log(Login) console.log("ok so, after the click we get this") } return
Sign in

} export default Sign;
